meanings.definition: The medical specialty that focuses on the diagnosis and treatment of pelvic floor disorders in women, including urinary incontinence and pelvic organ prolapse.
meanings.sent1: She decided to see a urogynecology specialist for her pelvic floor issue.
meanings.sent2: The hospital offers urogynecology services for women with specific health concerns.
meanings.sent3: The urogynecology appointment turned out to be a real eye-opener for her.
meanings.sent4: Her journey into urogynecology was like unraveling a mystery of her own body.
meanings.sent5: Learning about urogynecology helped her understand her health better.
